data.title: British Embassy Yerevan
data.text:
Opening hours

Monday to Friday from 9am to 12:30pm and from 2pm to 5pm.

Consular section

The Consular Section is open Monday to Friday 0930 to 1230 by appointment only except in an emergency. See our notarial and documentary services guide to make an appointment.

If you require emergency Consular assistance out of office hours please call +37410 264301 and choose the option for an emergency involving a British National.

Disabled access is available. Customers should contact the British Embassy Yerevan in advance of their appointment for assistance.

2024 public holidays

The embassy will be closed on the following days in 2024:
